text:
𝐄𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐥. 𝐅𝐥𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐬. 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦. 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐫𝐞.

Another output from our Marfa series, exploring the continuous flow & unfolding of ideas. Also a Judd homage in the minimalist 'Geometric Void' palette.

Code by @rapha-nyc
